ComicInfo.Title: Blood Battle
ComicInfo.Summary:
Boogieman and Brickhouse face SYSTEM, Rob Chaplik learns who is behind the explosive destruction of the Tenth Avenue Bridge, and the Syndicate launches a full-scale attack on Cross Station.
With Brick and Boogieman still dealing with the system drones more of the history behind the Big Bang is revealed, With the origin of Fade and Flashback revealed. Finally the Blood Syndicate arrive to help their team mate Brick house.
Robin is growing more an more comfortable with the team and likewise with them, to go along with the team she must find out information on who blew up the bridge that gaps Dakota from Paris Island. What she finds out will rock the team to its very core and show Robin that the Blood Syndicate are true to their turf.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:45:03. [CVDB37384]
ComicInfo.Characters: Boogieman, Brick House, DMZ, Dogg, Edwin Alva, Fade, Flashback, Masquerade, Rob Chaplik, Tech-9, Third Rail, Wise Son
